summary: An Ordinance amending Section 4 of Ordinance No. 30253 entitled: "An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2519 for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from Washington Street to Pike Street, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same and by constructing wooden walks, curbs and gutters thereon, under Ordinance No. 28930 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds." Approved October 29th, 1912.
